name: Magic Alchemist Under the Sea
description:
A magical and relaxing game in a mysterious underwater world.

Magic Alchemist -Under the Sea-

Deep under the sea some mysterious objects are to be merged. Exotic fish, luminous jellyfish and other water creatures are waiting for you in the deep blue sea, but can you make it to the last secret?

Magic Alchemist Under the Sea follows the rules of the classic Magic Alchemist and sends the player to a relaxing dive. A free magical game for hours of fun. If you want a relaxing but challenging experience, this easy-to-learn game is just the thing.

* Same gameplay as the original Magic Alchemist
* A mysterious underwater world
* Relaxing music
* Interesting objects can be discovered one after another
* Anemone fish, turtles, seahorses, orca ...
* Many air bubbles
* Luminous underwater things
* Local highscores on your device
* Online highscores for all versions of the Magic Alchemist
* The game can be paused at any time and continued later
* Even more air bubbles

Problems / Suggestions / Greetings: erdenkriecher@online.de
